name: Tuggl
description:
Tuggl makes creating your youtube playlist a whole lot EASIER! Simply find the video of your choice, open Tuggl & add it directly to your playlist.... It's that SIMPLE!

FEATURES:
‣ Add UNLIMITED videos to your library
‣ Background play support
‣ Endlessly play videos on repeat
‣ Lockscreen control support
‣ Create custom playlists to group your videos
‣ Play videos in LANDSCAPE mode


FOLLOW US!
• Instagram: @tugglapp
• Facebook.com/tugglapp
